concept.title: Indexes
concept.shortdesc: An index can be generated from index entries that occur in topic bodies, topic prologs, or DITA maps.

conbody.p: The specialized indexing domain also provides elements to enable additional indexing function, such as "See" and "See also".

dlentry.dd: (Unless combined with index-see) Instructs a processor to generate an index entry with a page reference. indexterm elements can be nested to create secondary and tertiary index entries.
Instructs a processor to generate a redirection to another index entry. The redirection typicaally does not have a page reference.
Instructs a processor to generate a redirection to another index entry. Both the index entry and the redirection have page references.
An indexterm element can contain multiple index-see-also elements.
